title: Decide what skin Illaoi will get!

WHY DEEP SPACE ILLAOI IS THE BEST CONCEPT OF THE THREE

We all know that, in her regular lore, {{champion:420}} is a faithful priestess of Nagakabouros that wholeheartedly embodies and preaches the teachings of her religion. Deep Space Illaoi completely turns that theme on its head, giving it a new horrifying spin: the priestess that once spread her truth through faith has now become a knowledge-seeking space explorer who was contaminated by a Dead Space-like alien creature and is now being mind-controlled by it in order to spread the infection.
On top of that, we already have another space skin, Astro{{champion:111}}, that could be beautifully incorporated in the new lore: "unwilling to abandon his fellow astronaut Illaoi, who fell to the infection, Nautilus keeps fighting against the space parasyte in order to find a cure" (which would be an ironic parallel to Nautilus' regular lore, where he got corrupted by a dark entity and left for dead by his own crew).

Call it something besides Battlecast, and I'm cool with it. As it is, it just doesn't fit the line. Especially with the "lore" concept. She isn't part of the Battlecast, she's fighting against it. Other than the lore, the concept art is too fluid and organic, where most of the skins are hard and angular.

Skins of the same line having different roles within that universe isn't really uncommon.

Arclight is all about warriors who were granted light powers.
Meanwhile Vel'koz is actually the being that grants the light powers(or at least one of them).

Similarly Karthus is part of the RPG-universe,but he is actually a player who turned into the big bad in it.

Arclight Vel'koz is still part of the Arclight "group" in that universe. He has the light powers, he just grants them to people, as well. It's like how Swain is still a Noxian, even though he's the leader of the nation. Karthus, on the other hand, is part of the RPG universe, but is not part of a specific, named "line" within the universe. 

What I'm trying to say is, if Illaoi ends up getting the Battlecast-themed skin, she can still be in the Battlecast universe, but in a different skin line within the universe. It would be like making a skin line for the bad guys in the Star Guardian universe. You wouldn't call them Star Guardians - they would be their own thing. Same for Illaoi - she isn't part of the Battlecast, she is fighting against them, and isn't even fully machinized like they are.
